long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows you to automate some routine actions on Linkedin (such as sending connection requests with a personalized message). By adding contacts to the watchlist, the extension tracks the most recent changes in the information specified in the profile. Extension also could send telegram notifications as soon as your professional contacts change their status or other profile info.
